287439.「……ずっと 待ちわびていました。\n あなたの 数千年の旅路が\n ようやく終:
I've been waiting for this day. The day your
journey of thousands of years finally comes to
an end.

287440.「お帰りなさい <kyodai>さん。\n ここは 生まれ変わった エテーネの村:
Welcome back <kyodai>. Here we are,
Ethene Village reborn!

287441.「ここから また始めよう……。\n おいらたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start again from here... a new future
for the three of us.

287443.冥王ネルゲルの襲来により\nバラバラの運命をたどった３人が\nついに 新エテーネ:
The three, who had been doomed to disparate
fates by the attack of Netherlord Nergel, were
finally reunited in the New Ethene Village!

287444.エテーネ村の人々は <kyodai>の帰郷を祝い\n宴を開き これまでのことを語:
The people of Ethene Village celebrated 's return with a feast, where they talked about all that had happened, and
the conversation went on forever...

287446.村の西にある 無人の水車小屋を\n<kyodai>の 新しい研究室として\nリフ:
It has been decided to renovate an unoccupied
water cabin west of the village as
<kyodai>'s new research lab!<me 71>

287447.「ここから また始めようぜ……。\n オレたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start again from here... a new future
for the three of us.

287448.「ここから また始めましょ……。\n あたしたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start again from here... a new future
for the three of us.

287449.「ここから また始めよう……。\n 私たち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start again from here... a new future
for the three of us.
